data.title: Kevin Costner and Octavia Spencer relationship explored: Are they really dating?
data.meta_description: What is the Kevin Costner and Octavia Spencer relationship like? Check out this article to learn more about their movies, relationships and romantic lives.
data.text:
Kevin Costner and Octavia Spencer have found themselves repeatedly cast together in TV films, including Black or White (2014) and Hidden Figures (2016). Their camaraderie extends beyond film sets as they have been pictured in several red-carpet events exchanging hugs and smiles. As usual, fans couldn't help but start speculation about the nature of Kevin Costner and Octavia Spencer relationship, with some concluding that they are dating. So, are the actors dating?

TABLE OF CONTENTS

Who is Kevin Costner?

Who is Octavia Spencer?

Kevin Costner's romantic relationships and marriages

Octavia Spencer's husband

Octavia Spencer and Kevin Costner friendship

Kevin Costner and Octavia Spencer movie

FAQs about Kevin Costner and Octavia Spencer

Wrapping up

Costner and Octavia first starred together in the TV film Black or White (2014). The film is a tug-of-war between Costner and Octavia for their young mixed-raced granddaughter. Octavia, the paternal grandmother, wants to secure custody of her granddaughter, while the alcoholic Costner is struggling to keep her.

Who is Kevin Costner?

Kevin Costner, born on January 18, 1955, in Lynwood, California, to William and Sharon Costner, is an American actor, filmmaker and musician.

He rose to fame for his roles in several films, including A Perfect World, Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves, Untouchables, Field of Dreams, Yellowstone, The Postman, Let Him Go, Man of Steel and more. Costner has won various awards for his exceptional acting, including a Primetime Emmy Award, three Golden Globe Awards and two Academy Awards.

In addition, Kevin Costner is the co-founder and singer of the famous country rock band Kevin Costner & Modern West. On November 11, 2008, the band released Untold Truths. This album was ranked 61 on the Billboard and 35 on the Top Heatseekers chart.

Who is Octavia Spencer?

Octavia Spencer, born on May 25, 1970, in Montgomery, Alabama, to Dellsena Spenser, is an American actress. Spencer made her first screen appearance in the TV film A Time to Kill but got her breakthrough in 2011 for her role in The Help, for which she won several accolades.

She then appeared in several blockbuster TV films/movies, including Mom, Truth be Told, Smashed, Hidden Figures, Red Band Society, Onward, Instant Family, The Shack and more. Octavia has received several awards in her career, including a British Academy Film Award, a Golden Globe Award and an Academy Award.

Kevin Costner's romantic relationships and marriages

Did Kevin Costner and Octavia Spencer date? No, Kevin and Spencer have never dated. In 1975, while still in college, Costner dated a fellow student, Cindy Silva, and they married in 1978. The couple divorced in 1994 after infidelity allegations - Costner had an affair while on the Waterworld set.

Following the divorce, Costner briefly dated Bridget Rooney and then Cunningham. He was involved with supermodel Elle Macpherson in 1996, and they even lived together. In 2004, Costner married Christine Baumgartner. Christine filed for a divorce in 2023, and it was finalised on February 20, 2024.

Octavia Spencer's husband

Is Octavia Spencer married to Kevin Costner? No, Octavia isn't married to Kevin Costner and has never been married. During an interview in 2014, Octavia opened up about why she's not interested in marriage or children. She revealed that while she thought both were in the card for her, life had other plans. Right now, she's only focused on her career.

Octavia Spencer and Kevin Costner friendship

Octavia and Costner’s friendship began because of their starring roles in two blockbuster TV films, Black or White and Hidden Figures.

While in red carpet events, particularly during the premieres of their movies, pictures of them hugging and sharing light-hearted moments were been captured, starting speculations that they may be romantically involved. In addition, these friends have attended several TV talk shows together to discuss their movies, further fuelling the rumours.

However, actors Octavia and Costner aren't romantically involved; they share a strong friendship bond.

Kevin Costner and Octavia Spencer movie

People are synonymous with the Costner/Spencer pair because of the Black or White film. This film is about a maternal grandfather (Kevin Costner) who is unexpectedly left to care for her granddaughter Eloise (Jillian Estell) after the death of his wife. He doesn’t know how to make Eloise’s hair and gets lost taking her to school. He also drinks whiskey for breakfast.

Meanwhile, the maternal grandmother (Octavia Spencer) thinks this is the perfect time for Eloise to move in with her. She seeks Eloise's custody with the help of her brother (Antony Mackie). The little girl is left torn between two families that love him dearly.

Who is the mother of Kevin Costner's black daughter? Eloise's mother was Costner's daughter who had a secret affair with a black man, "Octavia's son." Eloise's mother died in childbirth, and while Eloise's father, who's black and a drug addict, has never been in the picture, his family has.

FAQs about Kevin Costner and Octavia Spencer

Does Octavia Spencer have a husband and children? No, Octavia doesn’t have a husband or children and doesn’t intend to.

What surgery did Octavia Spencer have? About 18 years ago, Octavia Spencer underwent a gastric bypass surgery to lose weight but kept it a secret. However, the result wasn't as expected. Those close to her claim she couldn't follow the nutritional advice and thus gained weight again.

Who is Octavia Spencer's friend Tate? Tate Taylor was an office production assistant on A Time to Kill. His job was to hand-deliver call sheets to each filming department. While in the cast, he met Spencer, and they became lifelong friends.

How many biological children does Kevin Costner have? The Yellowstone star is a proud father of seven children.

How many wives has Kevin Costner had? The Dances with the Wolves actor has been married twice and is a father of seven children.

How many kids does Kevin have with his first wife? Costner married his first wife, Cindy Silva, in 1978 and divorced in 1994. They shared three children: Annie, Lily and Joe.

Why did Christine divorce Kevin? Kevin Costner and Christine’s 18-year marriage ended because of irreconcilable differences. The aftermath of their separation was marked by legal wrangling and disagreements.

Wrapping up

Kevin Costner and Octavia Spencer relationship is purely professional, contrary to people's opinions. The two talented actors have worked together in several blockbuster TV films, including White or Black and Hidden Figures.
